designSystemProfile.name: Trugly Gamified DeFi UI
designSystemProfile.description: A design system for a decentralized finance (DeFi) application with a friendly, gamified, and nature-themed user interface. The style is approachable and visually rich, using cute illustrations to frame the functional components and soften the complexity of financial transactions.

style.overallLook: The UI is characterized by heavily rounded corners on all container elements, soft drop shadows to create depth, and a clean, organized layout. The entire interface is framed by non-interactive, cartoon-style illustrations, which are a core part of the brand identity and user experience.

palette.description: Used for primary buttons, active states, borders, and key brand elements.

palette.value: Light green-tinted off-white or soft gradient
palette.description: The main background color for the entire application view.
Used as the background for all primary content cards and panels.

palette.value: Light grey or a desaturated minty-green
palette.description: Used for borders on cards and input fields.
Applied to cards and some buttons to lift them from the background.
Primary text color for high readability.
For labels, sub-text, and less important information.
Used for text on colored button backgrounds.
Contrasting color for data visualization lines.
Used to denote positive actions or status, such as 'BUY'.

palette.value: Array of distinct colors (e.g., orange, blue, yellow)
palette.description: Used for icons representing different categories or tokens.

typography.fontFamily: A modern, rounded sans-serif font (e.g., Poppins, Nunito, Inter).

styles.name: display
styles.description: For large, prominent numbers in input fields.

styles.name: subheading
styles.description: For smaller titles or primary labels like 'Marketcap'.

styles.name: body
styles.description: For standard text content and values in tables.

styles.name: label
styles.description: For minor details and helper text.

styles.name: button
styles.description: For text within all button components.

layout.container: A fixed-width main container, centered, with illustrative elements bleeding out from the edges to create a framed, immersive experience.
layout.grid: A two-column asymmetrical layout for the main content area. The left column is wider and contains the primary user task (Swap), while the right column contains supplementary data.

structure.name: header
structure.description: A full-width top bar holding the logo, primary navigation text links, and a main call-to-action button ('Connect Wallet').

structure.name: subHeader
structure.description: A horizontal 'flow' or 'stepper' component below the header, using icons connected by a line to represent a process, filter, or path.

structure.name: mainContent
structure.description: The two-column grid area holding all interactive modules and data cards.

structure.name: backgroundDecor
structure.description: Illustrative elements (plants, characters, rocks, frogs) placed on layers behind and in front of the UI to create depth and thematic context.

components.name: card
components.description: The base container for all modules.

variants.description: For the main action on a card, e.g., 'Review Swap'.
For the main action in the header, e.g., 'Connect Wallet'.
For simple, contextual actions like settings.

components.name: inputFieldGroup
components.description: A self-contained unit for numerical input, typically including a large number display and a token selector.
components.structure: Horizontally arranged. Contains a large, bold numerical input area on the left and a token selector dropdown on the right. A smaller label for the equivalent value is often included below the main input.

components.name: tokenSelector
components.description: A dropdown-like component for selecting a cryptocurrency token.
components.structure: Combines a circular token icon, the token symbol text, and a dropdown chevron icon.

components.name: dataPointCard
components.description: Small, compact cards for displaying a single key metric like Marketcap or Holders.
components.style: Extends the base 'card' style but with reduced padding and potentially no shadow to act as a sub-component.
components.structure: Contains a top-aligned label (typography.subheading) followed by a large, bold value (typography.display).

components.name: dataTable
components.description: A list for displaying sequential data like recent trades.
components.style: Contained within a parent card. Rows are separated by a thin horizontal line (1px solid border-primary). No vertical borders.
components.structure: Includes a header row with text-aligned column titles. Data rows are composed of distinct columns. Uses color coding (palette.indicator-positive) to indicate data type like 'BUY'.

components.name: flowNavigator
components.description: The horizontal stepper-like component in the sub-header.
components.style: Nodes are circular, featuring a colored background and a centered icon. All nodes are connected by a solid grey line that runs behind them.
components.structure: A series of steps, where each step consists of a circular icon and a text label positioned below it.

iconography.style: Primarily line-art with rounded terminals and a consistent stroke weight. Some icons, especially for token logos or in the flow navigator, are filled or full-color.
iconography.usage: Used within buttons, as standalone action triggers (settings), in data selectors (token icons), and to add visual context to links and navigation.

imagery.style: 2D vector illustrations with a cute, cartoonish aesthetic. Features anthropomorphic characters and stylized nature elements (plants, rocks, frogs). The color palette complements the core UI palette.
imagery.usage: Functions as a decorative frame for the application window, adding personality and brand identity. It is non-interactive and exists on layers behind and in front of the core UI to create a sense of depth.
